Like O'Keefe's first video, the second also prominently features Democratic operatives Robert Creamer and his colleague Scott Foval, who was removed from his position at the leftwing advocacy group Americans United for Change on Monday as a result of O'Keefe's investigation.

Scott Foval, the national field director of Americans United for Change, was booted on Monday and Democracy Partners head Robert Creamer announced on Tuesday he was "stepping back" from efforts to elect Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton.
